content: melted red velvet hat by adler j n materials big twist shine in titanium #1 white #2 and merlot #3 or other weight 3 yarn i-5 mm and h-5 5 mm hooks yarn needle notes this pattern uses the spike stitch if the explanation in the pattern isn t sufficient there are plenty of videos on youtube to look through brim using smaller hook chain 9 row 1-single_crochet in back ridge starting in second chain from hook row 2-single_crochet blo until last st single_crochet last st as normal repeat row 2 until right length for you in multiples of 6-in this example i used 78 row to fit a 23 head bring ends together and single_crochet through both loops on both ends don t fasten_off body row 1-switching to larger hook chain 1 single_crochet in the side of each row so your stitch count is the same number as your row slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off color #1 row 2-attatch #2 in first single_crochet single_crochet in same st and around slip_stitch to first single_crochet row3-7-chain 1 single_crochet in all slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 8-attatch #3 in first single_crochet single_crochet in same stitch in the next st insert hook in the second row down and single_crochet in that stitch for the next 4 stitches go down one row each time the 6th stitch being in the first row of color 2 you may need to keep the loop on the hook a bit loose while you pull up the next loop so it doesn t accidentally pull the previous stitches extra tight row 9-13-chain 1 single_crochet all slip_stitch to first single_crochet fasten_off #3 row 14-19-repeat row 8-13 with color #1 row 20-25-repeat row 8-13 with color #2 decreases row 26-repeat row 8 with color #3 row 27-chain 1 single_crochet all slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 28-ch1 *single_crochet 6 decrease* repeat * to end slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 29-chain 1 single_crochet all slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 30-ch1 *single_crochet 5 decrease* repeat * to end slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 31-chain 1 single_crochet all slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 32-ch1 *single_crochet 4 decrease* repeat * to end slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 33-chain 1 single_crochet all slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 34-ch1 *single_crochet 3 decrease* repeat * to end slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 35-chain 1 single_crochet all slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 36-ch1 *single_crochet 2 decrease* repeat * to end slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 37-chain 1 *single_crochet 1 decrease* repeat *to end slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 38-ch1 *decrease* repeat * to end slip_stitch to first single_crochet cut long tail weave through remaining st and pull tight
